titleStmt.title: The character of a Quaker in his true and proper colours, or, The clownish hypocrite anatomized
titleStmt.author: R. H.
Austin, Samuel, d. ca. 1665.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Joseph Smith to R.H.; cf. Bibliotheca Anti-Quakeriana, 1873, p. 208. Attributed also by BM to R.H. Wing attributes to Samuel Austin; DNB does not mention this work under Austin.
" Licensed and entred according to order."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
